entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow or periods of drizzle ending this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 early this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
